keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The players pleaded not guilty to charges related to home invasions and an assault. Tejay Johnson was among those arraigned.
snippet: The players pleaded not guilty to charges related to home invasions and an assault. Tejay Johnson was among those arraigned.
abstract: Seven former Rutgers football players plead not guilty to charges, including assault, in connection with home invasions.
